name: store-flight
description: Make a flight submission to the Windows Store
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: serviceEndpoint
inputs.label: Service endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Windows Developer Center endpoint configured with your credentials

inputs.name: nameType
inputs.label: App identification method
inputs.helpMarkDown: How to determine the app to publish

inputs.name: appId
inputs.label: Application ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: ID of the application, found in the URL for the application's page on the Dev Center

inputs.name: appName
inputs.label: Application primary name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Primary name of the application, found at the top of the application's page on the Dev Center

inputs.name: flightName
inputs.label: Flight name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the flight as seen on the Dev Center

inputs.name: packagePath
inputs.label: Package file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the application's package you want to flight. Minimatch pattern is supported.

inputs.name: force
inputs.label: Delete pending submissions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to delete an existing submission instead of failing the task

inputs.name: additionalPackages
inputs.label: Additional package(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Paths to any additional packages required by this application (one path per line). Minimatch pattern is supported.

inputs.name: skipPolling
inputs.label: Skip polling
inputs.helpMarkDown: Skip polling submission after committing it to Dev Center. **Warning**: if you check this box, you will not see errors, if any, that your submission may run into. You will have to manually check the status of your submission in Dev Center.

inputs.name: deletePackages
inputs.label: Delete Packages
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delete old unnecessary packages from the flight group you are submitting to.

inputs.name: numberOfPackagesToKeep
inputs.label: Number of Packages to keep
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of packages to keep per unique Target Device Family and Target Platform.

inputs.name: isMandatoryUpdate
inputs.label: Mandatory Update
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether you want to treat the packages in this submission as mandatory for self-installing app updates.

inputs.name: mandatoryUpdateDifferHours
inputs.label: The number of hours until packages become mandatory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The effective time when the packages in this submission become mandatory, in hours from submission time.
